price: Basi itawafikia kwa ghafla, na hali hawana khabari.
footnotes: Itawateremkia adhabu kwa ghafla bila ya kuitaraji, wala wao hawajui kama inakuja.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And it will come to them
